abstract: Senegal court sentences former Chad Pres Hissene Habre to life in prison for war crimes committed during his eight-year rein.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Habré, who led the African country from 1982 to 1990, was sentenced to life in prison for overseeing the suffering and death of his political enemies.

headline.main: Hissène Habré, Ex-President of Chad, Is Convicted of War Crimes
headline.print_headline: Ex-Leader of Chad Gets Life Sentence for War Crimes

snippet: Mr. Habré, who led the African country from 1982 to 1990, was sentenced to life in prison for overseeing the suffering and death of his political enemies.
